product_name: Edelrid Cosmic Lady Chalk Bag - Women's
long_description: Dip into the women's Edelrid Cosmic Lady Chalk Bag to keep your hands dry and grippy while you're at the climbing gym or bouldering outdoors. Nylon exterior features a fleece-lined chalk reservoir that holds plenty of powder (chalk sold separately). Drawcord closure keeps chalk from spilling out while not in use. Elastic loop holds a brush (not included) for cleaning off holds. The Edelrid Cosmic Twist Chalk Bag comes with a nylon webbing belt that adjusts easily.
short_description: Dip into the women's Edelrid Cosmic Lady Chalk Bag to keep your hands dry and grippy while you're at the climbing gym or bouldering outdoors.
